languages.text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас оценивающий взгляд, однако его ответ адресован Маражаю.{/n} "Кабал на грани гибели. Нам нужна помощь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас оценивающий взгляд, однако его ответ адресован Маражаю.{/n} "Кабал на грани гибели. Нам нужна помощь".
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас оценивающий взгляд, однако его ответ адресован Маражаю.{/n} "Кабал на грани гибели. Нам нужна помощь".

languages.text: {n}Kharael mustert dich prüfend, doch seine Antwort ist an Marazhai gerichtet.{/n} "Die Kabale steht am Rand der Zerstörung. Wir benötigen Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael mustert dich prüfend, doch seine Antwort ist an Marazhai gerichtet.{/n} "Die Kabale steht am Rand der Zerstörung. Wir benötigen Unterstützung."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔打量了你一眼，随后继续向玛拉斋开口。{/n}“阴谋团正处于毁灭的边缘，我们需要援助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔打量了你一眼，随后继续向玛拉斋开口。{/n}“阴谋团正处于毁灭的边缘，我们需要援助。”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael vous jauge du regard, mais s'adresse à Marazhai.{/n} « La Kabale est sur le point d'être anéantie. Nous avons besoin d'aide. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael vous jauge du regard, mais s'adresse à Marazhai.{/n} « La Kabale est sur le point d'être anéantie. Nous avons besoin d'aide. »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael te evalúa con la mirada, pero su respuesta está dirigida a Marazhai.{/n} «La Kábala está al borde de la destrucción. Necesitamos ayuda».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael te evalúa con la mirada, pero su respuesta está dirigida a Marazhai.{/n} «La Kábala está al borde de la destrucción. Necesitamos ayuda».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}カラエルは品定めするような視線をこちらに投げてくるが、返事はマラズハイに向けられた。{/n}「陰謀団は滅亡の危機にある。我々には助けが必要だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルは品定めするような視線をこちらに投げてくるが、返事はマラズハイに向けられた。{/n}「陰謀団は滅亡の危機にある。我々には助けが必要だ」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarıyla seni ölçüp biçen Kharael, yanıtını Marazhai'a hitaben veriyor.{/n} "Kabal yok oluşun eşiğinde. Desteğini talep ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael casts an appraising glance at you, but his response is addressed to Marazhai.{/n} "The Kabal is on the verge of destruction. We require assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael sana ölçüp biçen bir bakış atıyor ancak yanıtını Marazhai'a hitaben veriyor:{/n} "Kabal yok oluşun eşiğinde. Desteğini talep ediyoruz."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
